statements: DELETE FROM insurance_premiums WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM insurance_premiums WHERE gender = 'Female' AND occupation = 'Doctor' AND premium_amount < 500.00;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 100 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 1000 AND age > 30
DELETE FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_id IN (SELECT payment_id FROM PremiumPayments WHERE amount < 100)
